title: Translate Into System
text: Let's set x to the number of adult tickets sold and y to the number of child tickets sold. Then, we have: $$x+y=147$$, $$11x+8y=1302$$

title: Eliminating One Variable
text: Let's eliminate y so that we can solve for x. Multiply the first equation by -8 and then add. $$3x=126$$
